T02TD1682E:306a-1: shr'i badzra satva aa nu smri tin'a ma bidhi /
T02TD1682E:306a-3: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD1682E:306a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1682E:306a-5: rab gnas yul tshogs nyams dga' bar //
T02TD1682E:306a-7: / rnam dag gnyis med yul kun sbyor //
T02TD1682E:306a-8: byang chub sems byung rgyal ba'i mchog / de la de snang rol mo'i chos //
T02TD1682E:306a-9: srid mtha'i ma dmigs dus gsum 'gog / rnam dpyad bya ba'i rgyud ldan zhing //
T02TD1682E:306a-10: rigs bdag dkyil 'khor bstod pa'i gnas //
T02TD1682E:306a-11: nges pa'i gsang mchog rtsa ba'i rgyud //
T02TD1682E:306a-12: de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs chen po //
T02TD1682E:306a-13: gnyis dang gnyis med theg pa'i mchog / rjes su dran pa skyed byed pa'i //
T02TD1682E:306a-14: cho ga bzang po rmad du byung //
T02TD1682E:306a-15: gsang don brgyud pa'i rdo rje'i tshig / dus gsum rgyun gyi mtshan ldan bcing //
T02TD1682E:306a-16: rigs bdag dkyil 'khor bstod pa'i gnas //
T02TD1682E:306a-17: 'khor ba'i bya ba kun gnas 'jug / dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang //
T02TD1682E:306a-18: bsnyen sgrub yan lag dang bcas bshad //
T02TD1682E:306a-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i yul //
T02TD1682E:306a-20: bya ba'i yan lag kun rdzogs shing //
T02TD1682E:306a-21: nges pa'i gsang ba ston mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1682E:306a-23: thams cad du sa zhes bya ba yi //
T02TD1682E:306a-24: lta ba la sogs 'byung ba'i chos //
T02TD1682E:306a-25: nyon mongs gnas kun rnam dag cing //
T02TD1682E:306a-26: rang bzhin mnyam pas spros dang bral //
T02TD1682E:306a-27: yang dag sangs rgyas bde ba che //
T02TD1682E:306a-28: kun du goms pas gsal byed pa'i //
T02TD1682E:306a-29: yan lag lam gnyis rdzogs pa'i grogs //
T02TD1682E:306a-31: rig 'dzin gnas kun bgrod byed cing //
T02TD1682E:306a-32: rgyu rkyen cha shas kun rdzogs shing //
T02TD1682E:306a-33: thun mong bye brag rkyen gyi stobs //
T02TD1682E:306a-34: snga ma las byung phyi ma'i rgyun //
T02TD1682E:306a-35: 'bras bu tshogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1682E:306a-36: sa dang sar gnas rig 'dzin kun //
T02TD1682E:306a-37: rang rig sbyor ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1682E:306a-38: gsang sngags phyag rgya'i gnas kun dang //
T02TD1682E:306a-39: mi mthun gnyen po bye brag mthus //
T02TD1682E:306a-40: dngos grub mtha' yas rtag ldan zhing //
T02TD1682E:306a-41: ting 'dzin chos kun rdzogs pa'i mthar //
T02TD1682E:306a-42: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas mthong zhing //
T02TD1682E:306a-43: nges pa'i sa mchog rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1682E:306a-44: rigs kyi 'khor lo kun bskor zhang //
T02TD1682E:306a-45: rigs kyi gnas rnams rnam dag pas //
T02TD1682E:306a-46: rigs mchog yon tan bzang po'i tshogs //
T02TD1682E:306b-0: @306b rigs kun rgyal bas mnyam sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1682E:306b-1: yang dag nges pa'i theg pa'i mchog / dam ba las byung dam pa'i yul //
T02TD1682E:306b-2: de gnas tshul gyis phreng ba nyid //
T02TD1682E:306b-3: yang dag bde bas rgyan du byas //
T02TD1682E:306b-4: dkyil 'khor chen po dga' tshal dang //
T02TD1682E:306b-5: chos kyi rgyal po'i grong khyer mchog / chos kyi 'khor lo rim 'jug pas //
T02TD1682E:306b-6: chos kyi 'bras bu bzang po nyid //
T02TD1682E:306b-7: shin tu sbyor bas yang dag skyes //
T02TD1682E:306b-8: me tog tshal las kha dog dri //
T02TD1682E:306b-9: 'dod pa'i tshogs rnams tshim gyur ltar //
T02TD1682E:306b-10: rang gnas byang chub yan lag phreng //
T02TD1682E:306b-11: bsnyen dang nye bar bsnyen pa dang //
T02TD1682E:306b-12: sgrub dang sgrub pa chen po yi //
T02TD1682E:306b-13: yan lag cha shas kun rdzogs pas //
T02TD1682E:306b-14: zhi sogs bye brag rnam par bkod //
T02TD1682E:306b-15: sangs rgyas theg pa'i yan lag gis //
T02TD1682E:306b-17: sa mtshams mkhas pa'i spyod yul nyid //
T02TD1682E:306b-18: rkyen bcas stobs kyis rab tu rdzogs //
T02TD1682E:306b-19: dkyil 'khor yan lag stobs ldan pa'i //
T02TD1682E:306b-20: bla ma lhag gnas brtul zhugs can //
T02TD1682E:306b-21: yon tan rin chen 'bras bu'i bdag / byang chub mchog sems rnam dag pa //
T02TD1682E:306b-22: yang dag mos pas bstod byas te //
T02TD1682E:306b-23: sgo gsum dang bas gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1682E:306b-24: gdams pa'i yan lag kun 'dzin cing //
T02TD1682E:306b-25: nye bar 'khor ba'i dga' ston mchog / dkyil 'khor chen por dgyes byas pas //
T02TD1682E:306b-26: rab tu rdzogs par 'khor lo dbang //
T02TD1682E:306b-27: de nyid yan lag dam tshig bcas //
T02TD1682E:306b-28: nges par 'jug pas bstan byas pa'o //
T02TD1682E:306b-29: gsang ba'i rgyud don sna tshogs dag /'dren pa'i yan lag bla na med //
T02TD1682E:306b-30: nges par bstan pa'i phyag rgya yi //
T02TD1682E:306b-31: yan lag rdzogs pas theg pa'i mchog / dben ba yi ni gnas dag gam //
T02TD1682E:306b-32: rang gi skyed mos tshal sogs par //
T02TD1682E:306b-33: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02TD1682E:306b-34: kun du sna tshogs bde mchog gis //
T02TD1682E:306b-35: kun du sna tshogs dgongs pa rnams //
T02TD1682E:306b-36: ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1682E:306b-37: gnas kyi nye 'khor phyag dar dang //
T02TD1682E:306b-38: dri zhim tshur bcas dag byas te //
T02TD1682E:306b-39: dkyil 'khor sa gzhi bzang po'i mchog / bkra shis dag byed rdzas kyis byug / phyogs bcur bla re rgyal mtshan dang //
T02TD1682E:306b-40: 'phan gdugs lha ba lhub rnga yab dang //
T02TD1682E:306b-41: rin chen me tog phreng ba'i tshogs //
T02TD1682E:306b-43: phyag rgya gos dang rgyan bcas pas //
T02TD1682E:306b-44: ma lus kun du nye bar mdzes //
T02TD1682E:306b-45: thabs dang shes rab brtul zhugs mchog / bde ba'i ye shes rol mo'i dbyings //
T02TD1682E:306b-46: rnam par 'phrul pas bsam byas pas //
T02TD1682E:306b-48: ji snyed mchod pa'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD1682E:307a-1: brgyan dag / bsang spyad bkra shis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1682E:307a-2: rim bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya gnas //
T02TD1682E:307a-3: 'gro gnas kun gyi nyon mongs tshogs //
T02TD1682E:307a-4: mi dge stobs sogs sdig pa'i mthus //
T02TD1682E:307a-5: gnas kun nyam thag gzir bas 'joms //
T02TD1682E:307a-6: bdag gzhan kun rgyud rlag par byed //
T02TD1682E:307a-7: de dag thugs rje chen po'i blos //
T02TD1682E:307a-8: ma lus yul bcas sgrol ba'i phyir //
T02TD1682E:307a-9: dran pa gcig pa'i ye shes sku //
T02TD1682E:307a-10: ting 'dzin dag pas rnam par grol //
T02TD1682E:307a-11: phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyi //
T02TD1682E:307a-12: rang bzhin gnyis med byang chub sems //
T02TD1682E:307a-13: der snang yul las 'das pa nyid //
T02TD1682E:307a-14: lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid do //
T02TD1682E:307a-15: tshul 'di rnam par spangs pa yi //
T02TD1682E:307a-16: de nas de las de bzhin rgyud //
T02TD1682E:307a-17: kye ma thugs rje chen po'i yul //
T02TD1682E:307a-18: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa nyid //
T02TD1682E:307a-19: rnam gsum lha yi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1682E:307a-20: rnam gsum sngags dang phyag rgyar sbyor //
T02TD1682E:307a-21: byin rlabs nus mthu rdzogs byas nas //
T02TD1682E:307a-22: bdag gzhan sbyangs shing gsal byas te //
T02TD1682E:307a-23: rigs mchog sku gsung thugs kyi bdag / yang dag 'od zer rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1682E:307a-24: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa nyid //
T02TD1682E:307a-25: tshul gsum phyag rgya'i cha lugs kyis //
T02TD1682E:307a-26: shin tu bkod pa legs 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1682E:307a-27: tshad med bzhi li gnas rdzogs 'gyur //
T02TD1682E:307a-28: kun nas spyan drangs brtan byas pa //
T02TD1682E:307a-29: nye bar sbyor ba'i phyag rgya nyid //
T02TD1682E:307a-30: aom yang dag brtan pas stobs rdzogs pa'i ;
T02TD1682E:307a-31: / rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1682E:307a-32: thugs rjes bdag nyid rnam grol ba //
T02TD1682E:307a-33: dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i las la dgyes //
T02TD1682E:307a-34: mi shes yul rnams bcom mdzad cing //
T02TD1682E:307a-35: rig pa'i gnas chen snyoms 'jug par //
T02TD1682E:307a-36: phyag rgya bde ba'i tshul sbyor bas //
T02TD1682E:307a-37: grong khyer brtan par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1682E:307a-40: dza:h'um bam ho:pra be sha ya phat /
T02TD1682E:307a-41: badzra a'a be sha ya aa a'a /
T02TD1682E:307a-42: ji srid brtan pa'i gnas bzhugs shing //
T02TD1682E:307a-43: byang chub sems mchog spel ba'i phyir //
T02TD1682E:307a-44: bkra shis lhag gnas brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1682E:307a-45: zhing khams pho brang dag par brjod /
T02TD1682E:307a-46: aom badzra tsakra mandala pa nas pa ri h'um /
T02TD1682E:307a-47: rab tu gus pa'i tshul gyis ni /
T02TD1682E:307a-48: mngon par dmigs byas dag pa'i mchog / thabs dang shes rab rdzogs byed pa'i //
T02TD1682E:307a-49: yul kun rang bzhin rnam par dag / gang 'dir yon tan bsngags pa'i gnas //
T02TD1682E:307a-50: rgyal ba bde gshegs 'dren pa'i gtso //
T02TD1682E:307a-51: rigs mchog rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas //
T02TD1682E:307b-0: ngo mtshar yul kun rnam @307b par dag / aom na mo stu sti bandha nam ka ro ya mi //
T02TD1682E:307b-2: kun 'byung yon tan rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1682E:307b-3: me tog 'bras bu bzang ldan zhing //
T02TD1682E:307b-4: kun du bzang po'i rgyan rnams dang //
T02TD1682E:307b-5: 'dod pa'i lha mo rkyen ldan zhing //
T02TD1682E:307b-6: yul kun chags pas rnam grol ba //
T02TD1682E:307b-7: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bla med pa //
T02TD1682E:307b-8: lha dang lho mo bsam yas pas //
T02TD1682E:307b-9: phyogs bcu kun nas rnam par 'khrigs //
T02TD1682E:307b-10: bya ba'i yul kun ma lus dag / yang dag bsngo ba bla na med //
T02TD1682E:307b-11: gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dngos //
T02TD1682E:307b-12: gnyis su med pa'i rol pa dag / mnyam nyid rol mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02TD1682E:307b-13: mnyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid du //
T02TD1682E:307b-14: aom sarba p'u dza me gha pra ti tstsha ho //
T02TD1682E:307b-15: thog med yun rings 'khor ba'i gnas //
T02TD1682E:307b-16: ma lus nye bar bsags pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1682E:307b-17: kun spyod gnas gsum las skyes pa //
T02TD1682E:307b-18: thams cad yul la nye bar bshags //
T02TD1682E:307b-19: rab rtogs nye bar bsags pa'i chos //
T02TD1682E:307b-20: tshul khrims brtul zhugs sdom pa dang //
T02TD1682E:307b-21: nyer mdzes brgyan pa'i yan lag rnams //
T02TD1682E:307b-22: rab bsngags bstod pas yi rang mchog / sangs rgyas kun gyi lam ston cing //
T02TD1682E:307b-23: don bzhin bstan pas 'dul mdzad de //
T02TD1682E:307b-24: sbyor ba'i stobs bcas shes rab tshogs //
T02TD1682E:307b-25: thabs kyi theg chen bshad du gsol //
T02TD1682E:307b-26: phyogs bcu'i mgron gnas ji snyed mtha' //
T02TD1682E:307b-27: mya ngan kun sgrol mgon po rnams //
T02TD1682E:307b-28: sku gsum bstan pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1682E:307b-29: dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i dbyings //
T02TD1682E:307b-30: ma lus srid dngos 'gro ba'i tshogs 'don cing //
T02TD1682E:307b-31: yang dag gnyis med brtan par byed pa'i yid //
T02TD1682E:307b-32: byang chub sems mchog bla na med pa'i don //
T02TD1682E:307b-33: yang dag brtan gnas kun du rgyas par bya //
T02TD1682E:307b-34: smin cing grol bar byed pa'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD1682E:307b-35: khyad par lam kun yang dag rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1682E:307b-36: bsnyen sgrub phyag rgya'i yan lag sna tshogs pas //
T02TD1682E:307b-37: bdag gzhan bzung zhing yan lag rdzogs par spyad //
T02TD1682E:307b-38: thugs rje rnam dag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i chogs //
T02TD1682E:307b-39: rab tu grol bas gnyis med mnyam ldan pa'i //
T02TD1682E:307b-40: thams cad mthun pa'i tshul rnams mdzad bcas pas //
T02TD1682E:307b-41: bdag gi cha shas rab tu dmigs pas dbul //
T02TD1682E:307b-42: thams cad mi gnyis ye shes chen po bdag / bya byed rtog pa'i tshogs rnams rnam dag cing //
T02TD1682E:308a-0: sgyu ma rnam dag bya rtsal bde ba'i mchog / mkha' 'gro @308a * //
T02TD1682E:308a-1: sgyu ma'i don rdzogs mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD1682E:308a-2: mgon po dus gsum sgrib bral sangs rgyas kun //
T02TD1682E:308a-3: dngos grub phrin las yul rnams nye bar ston //
T02TD1682E:308a-4: rang gnas nyams dga' mnyam nyid mchog gi bdag / rnam dag bya ba'i tshul gyi yul las 'das //
T02TD1682E:308a-5: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02TD1682E:308a-7: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02TD1682E:308a-9: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1682E:308a-10: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1682E:308a-11: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD1682E:308a-15: ha ha ha ha ho:bha ga w'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02TD1682E:308a-16: badzr'i bha wa ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a:/
T02TD1682E:308a-18: rtse gcig dran pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1682E:308a-19: ma lus yul bcas rnam par grol //
T02TD1682E:308a-20: phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba'i mthus //
T02TD1682E:308a-21: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs nyid //
T02TD1682E:308a-22: 'gro gnas sdug bsngal las grol zhing //
T02TD1682E:308a-23: bde ba'i mchog kun mthar phyin te /
T02TD1682E:308a-24: thar pa mya ngan las 'das par //
T02TD1682E:308a-25: btang snyoms kun du mi dmigs pa'i //
T02TD1682E:308a-26: drag po'i chogs bcas ma lus kun //
T02TD1682E:308a-27: rab tu zhen rtog stobs kyis 'jug / de dag thugs rje chen po yis //
T02TD1682E:308a-28: 'dul byed stobs chen he ru ka //
T02TD1682E:308a-29: phyag rgya dbyings dang mnyam par sbyor //
T02TD1682E:308a-30: rnam par grol ba'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1682E:308a-31: phyogs bcu'i bgegs tshogs 'dul bar mdzad //
T02TD1682E:308a-32: yang dag dkyil 'khor brtan byas te //
T02TD1682E:308a-36: // / dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan pa la //
T02TD1682E:308a-37: bgegs kyi rgyal po kun bsdus te //
T02TD1682E:308a-38: phyag rgya bzhi yis dbang byas nas //
T02TD1682E:308a-39: myos shing gzir gnon rnam par dgod //
T02TD1682E:308a-40: thugs kyi ye shes rab 'bar ba //
T02TD1682E:308a-41: ye shes phyag rgya'i gnas kyis 'jug / kun nas 'phro zhing bsdu ba'i mthus //
T02TD1682E:308a-43: zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs par byed //
T02TD1682E:308a-44: rgyan cha mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD1682E:308a-45: cha lugs rngam pa'i cha byad ldan //
T02TD1682E:308a-46: rigs kyi sprul pa'i bsam yas pa'o //
T02TD1682E:308a-47: gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ston cing //
T02TD1682E:308a-48: nges par brjod pa'i sngags rnams kyis //
T02TD1682E:308a-49: kun nas brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02TD1682E:308a-50: yang dag sbyor bcas rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1682E:308a-51: aom badzra kro dha mus la tstshinda tsitshinda h'um /
T02TD1682E:308a-56: shr'i he ru ka kro dh'i shva rih'um phat /
T02TD1682E:308a-57: thams cad kun nas rdzogs pa'i chos //
T02TD1682E:308a-58: rnam gsum yul kun rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1682E:308b-0: byang chub sems nyid rang byung @308b ba'i ;
T02TD1682E:308b-1: / thams cad rdzogs pa'i gnas nyid do //
T02TD1682E:308b-2: aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'a tma konya ham //
T02TD1682E:308b-3: thugs rje chen po'i rgyun gyis ni //
T02TD1682E:308b-4: thams cad khyab mdzad rin chen tshogs //
T02TD1682E:308b-5: don kun snang ba'i gnas rdzogs te //
T02TD1682E:308b-6: sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnam par dag / aom dha rma dh'a tu badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma kony ham //
T02TD1682E:308b-7: rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /'og min gnas mchog nyam dga' bar //
T02TD1682E:308b-8: phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i cha lugs kyis //
T02TD1682E:308b-10: thugs rje chags pa'i ting 'dzin dang //
T02TD1682E:308b-11: gsang ba sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD1682E:308b-12: pho brang rnam par dag pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1682E:308b-13: rnam par 'phrul bas bskyed pa'i tshul //
T02TD1682E:308b-14: thugs kyi gsang sngags kun 'gyur gnas //
T02TD1682E:308b-15: rim bzhin sbyor ba'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD1682E:308b-16: sa bon gsang sngags spro bya ste //
T02TD1682E:308b-17: rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mdzad //
T02TD1682E:308b-18: ae las nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02TD1682E:308b-19: chos 'byung gru gsum gyen bsgreng dkar //
T02TD1682E:308b-20: yam las rlung dkyil gzhu yi dbyibs //
T02TD1682E:308b-21: dud kha sra mkhregs rgyal mtshan can //
T02TD1682E:308b-22: bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'byung //
T02TD1682E:308b-23: dkar zlum kun 'byung bum pas mtshan //
T02TD1682E:308b-24: lam las dbang chen sa gzhi dbyibs //
T02TD1682E:308b-25: gru bzhi gser mdog rdo rjes brgyan //
T02TD1682E:308b-26: kham las rim bzhin brtsegs pa'i mchog / kha dog dbyi bas rgyan kun rdzogs pa //
T02TD1682E:308b-27: sum las ri yi rgyal po ste //
T02TD1682E:308b-28: rin chen sna tshogs las grub pa'o //
T02TD1682E:308b-29: ram las me yi dkyil 'khor mchog / dmar ser gru gsum ram yig mtshan //
T02TD1682E:308b-30: de dbus bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02TD1682E:308b-31: gru bzhi sgo bzhi sgro khyud bcas //
T02TD1682E:308b-32: ra pa rim gsum dur khrod dang /
T02TD1682E:308b-33: kun 'byung rin chen phreng bas mdzes //
T02TD1682E:308b-34: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mtshan ldan pa'i //
T02TD1682E:308b-35: rgyan tshogs rnam par spras pa la //
T02TD1682E:308b-36: 'od gsal thugs rje byang chub sems //
T02TD1682E:308b-37: rnam dag dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i mchog / pho brang 'khor lo'i lte dbus su //
T02TD1682E:308b-38: re'u cha'i phreng ba rdo rjes mdzes /
T02TD1682E:308b-39: gdan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod pa'i //
T02TD1682E:308b-40: ma 'dres par ni dag pa'i don //
T02TD1682E:308b-41: dbus kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1682E:308b-42: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
T02TD1682E:308b-44: rigs dang rigs bcas mnyam par sbyor //
T02TD1682E:309a-0: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad @309a * //
T02TD1682E:309a-2: / klu dbyangs 'od bcas bskul bar mdzad //
T02TD1682E:309a-3: thams cad rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1682E:309a-4: de gnas mtha' rnams bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1682E:309a-5: phyag rgya'i rol pas mnyes 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1682E:309a-6: rtog med byang chub sems kyi sku //
T02TD1682E:309a-7: shes rab 'od gsal bcu drug phreng ;
T02TD1682E:309a-9: 'gro rnams bde gshegs yul sbyor te //
T02TD1682E:309a-10: rang gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan //
T02TD1682E:309a-11: thabs mchog thugs rje gsal byed phreng //
T02TD1682E:309a-12: sbyor ba rnams gnyis mdzad bcas rdzogs //
T02TD1682E:309a-13: sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang po nyid //
T02TD1682E:309a-14: g-yas g-yon phreng ba 'khor lo'i tshul //
T02TD1682E:309a-15: thams cad gcig tu sbyor ba'i mthus //
T02TD1682E:309a-16: rin chen kha dog sna lnga po //
T02TD1682E:309a-17: h'um mdzes byed rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdzogs //
T02TD1682E:309a-18: dkar gsal 'od mdangs lnga yis brgyan //
T02TD1682E:309a-19: rab tu sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1682E:309a-20: phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i nga rgyal nyid //
T02TD1682E:309a-22: drug bcas bcu drug gnas rnams dag / ma 'dres theg pa bsam yas kyis //
T02TD1682E:309a-23: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdus //
T02TD1682E:309a-24: rab 'bar gsal bas brjid pa'i sku //
T02TD1682E:309a-25: gsang sngags yi ge'i phreng bas mdzes //
T02TD1682E:309a-26: aom ma h'a su kh'a badzra satva a'a:/
T02TD1682E:309a-29: phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1682E:309a-30: rdo rje sems gtso bde ba'i mchog / zhal bzhi phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis mdzes //
T02TD1682E:309a-31: dbus dkar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin //
T02TD1682E:309a-32: g-yas sngo g-yon dmar rgyab ser bo //
T02TD1682E:309a-33: rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes //
T02TD1682E:309a-34: thugs rje chags pa'i don mdangs ldan //
T02TD1682E:309a-35: phrin las rnam bzhi cha lugs bcas ;
T02TD1682E:309a-36: / g-yas na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar //
T02TD1682E:309a-37: g-yon na kha tv'am dril bu 'khor //
T02TD1682E:309a-38: 'og gnyis zhi gnas lhag mthong rgya //
T02TD1682E:309a-39: 'od mdangs lnga yi phreng bas mdzes //
T02TD1682E:309a-40: rin chen rgyan dang na bza' dang //
T02TD1682E:309a-41: phyag rgya rnam lnga mtshan dpe rdzogs //
T02TD1682E:309a-42: 'od kyi rig ma dang sbyor cing //
T02TD1682E:309a-43: bde ba'i rol pas kun spyod mdzad //
T02TD1682E:309a-44: mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1682E:309a-45: gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02TD1682E:309a-46: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi //
T02TD1682E:309a-47: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ldan byas te //
T02TD1682E:309a-48: thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1682E:309a-49: bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya //
T02TD1682E:309a-50: thugs gsal nyi ma la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1682E:309a-51: ye shes sems dpa' h'um dang bcas //
T02TD1682E:309b-1: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dgug byas te //
T02TD1682E:309b-2: gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang chub sems //
T02TD1682E:309b-3: bdud rtsi'i bum bcas lha mo'i tshogs //
T02TD1682E:309b-4: gnas rnams kun du khrus byas pas //
T02TD1682E:309b-5: rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mdzes //
T02TD1682E:309b-6: mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
T02TD1682E:309b-7: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug / gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyor //
T02TD1682E:309b-8: lhag ma rdo rje thal mo nyid //
T02TD1682E:309b-9: spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang //
T02TD1682E:309b-10: mgrin pa gnyis dang ltag par ro //
T02TD1682E:309b-12: thod skam phyag rgyas brtan byas pas //
T02TD1682E:309b-13: rim bzhin gnas kun brgyan par bya //
T02TD1682E:309b-15: rin chen myu gu'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1682E:309b-16: rgyan rnams nye bar gdags byas te //
T02TD1682E:309b-17: rin chen phreng ba dar dpyangs bcing //
T02TD1682E:309b-18: rdo rje rgya gram khro bor bcas //
T02TD1682E:309b-19: ska nan rgyan thag bgos pa dang //
T02TD1682E:309b-20: mnyes pa'i thal mos brtan par bya //
T02TD1682E:309b-21: aom ratna m'a la aa bi shinytsa tr'am /
T02TD1682E:309b-22: aom pa tra lam ba aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD1682E:309b-24: rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i padma rnams //
T02TD1682E:309b-25: dag pa'i mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas ba ;
T02TD1682E:309b-26: / mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas grub par mdzod //
T02TD1682E:309b-27: ae ma ho mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1682E:309b-28: mchog tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog / rang gi dam tshig rtag la rol cig rol cig ho //
T02TD1682E:309b-29: mkha' gsang dbyangs dang ye shes rgya //
T02TD1682E:309b-30: sa bon rdo rje padmar bcas //
T02TD1682E:309b-32: brla yi dbus su gzhug bya ste //
T02TD1682E:309b-33: ling+ga rdo rjer byin brla bas pas //
T02TD1682E:309b-34: rdo rje sems sogs skur bskyed do //
T02TD1682E:309b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes mdzad cing //
T02TD1682E:309b-37: 'gro ba'i gnas chen rnam dag par //
T02TD1682E:309b-38: mkha' gsang rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02TD1682E:309b-39: h'um las bskyed pa'i rdor sems ni //
T02TD1682E:309b-40: gsang gnas dbus kyi gdan la gzhug / aom las gling bu tr'am pi wam //
T02TD1682E:309b-41: bam las rnga chen dzam rdza rnga //
T02TD1682E:309b-42: aa las me tog a'a spos me //
T02TD1682E:309b-43: aam las mar me ai dri chab //
T02TD1682E:309b-44: phyogs dang mtshams su rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1682E:309b-45: mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams so //
T02TD1682E:309b-46: dza: h'um bam ho:sgo bzhi ru //
T02TD1682E:309b-47: rta mgrin 'phang mtho la sogs bskyed //
T02TD1682E:309b-48: bha gar ling+ga bcug byas nas //
T02TD1682E:309b-49: der ni mtshan ma bsgom par bya //
T02TD1682E:309b-50: rdor je sems dpa'i phyag rgya che //
T02TD1682E:309b-51: sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o //
T02TD1682E:309b-52: kun du don mdzad 'dus pa dang //
T02TD1682E:309b-53: thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par sbyor //
T02TD1682E:310a-2: rdo rje lcags sgrog shar gyi phyogs //
T02TD1682E:310a-3: pi wang ser mo rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD1682E:310a-4: glu dbyangs drug ldan lho yi phyogs //
T02TD1682E:310a-5: rnga chen dmar mo rdo rje'i rnga //
T02TD1682E:310a-6: brdung mdzad nub kyi phyogs na gnas //
T02TD1682E:310a-7: rdza rnga ljang gu rdza rngal [*?] //
T02TD1682E:310a-8: rdo rjes mtshan brdung byang gi phyogs //
T02TD1682E:310a-9: me tog dmar ser rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD1682E:310a-10: gzhong thogs me yi mtshams su gnas //
T02TD1682E:310a-11: spos me dkar sngon rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD1682E:310a-12: pog thogs bden bral mtshams su gnas //
T02TD1682E:310a-13: mar me dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD1682E:310a-14: gsal 'dzin rlung gi phyogs su gnas //
T02TD1682E:310a-15: dri chab ljang khu rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD1682E:310a-16: dag 'thor dbang ldan mtshams su gnas //
T02TD1682E:310a-17: rta mgrin 'phang mtho dkar mdangs can //
T02TD1682E:310a-18: lcags kyu rta mgo ljang gu shar //
T02TD1682E:310a-19: phag gdong nag mo zhags pa g-yon //
T02TD1682E:310a-20: g-yas pa mche ba lho yi sgor //
T02TD1682E:310a-21: snang ba dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis //
T02TD1682E:310a-22: nyi zla lcags sgrog nub kyi phyogs //
T02TD1682E:310a-23: thal byed ljang gu g-yas dril bu //
T02TD1682E:310a-24: g-yon pa bhandha dkur bcas byang //
T02TD1682E:310a-25: aom he ra ti badzra bi la /
T02TD1682E:310a-27: he ra ti badzra g'i te te tam /
T02TD1682E:310a-28: he ra ti badzra h'a sya ha ta bam /
T02TD1682E:310a-29: he ra ti badzra nri te pe ba le ba dzam /
T02TD1682E:310a-34: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:/
T02TD1682E:310a-36: aom badzra shrim kha li bam /
T02TD1682E:310a-38: 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD1682E:310a-39: rnam mdzes phreng ba'i rgyan thogs shing //
T02TD1682E:310a-40: glu dbyangs rol mo'i gar du bcas //
T02TD1682E:310a-41: lha mo bcu gnyis rang snang rdzogs //
T02TD1682E:310a-42: dbang po drug la sangs rgyas kyi //
T02TD1682E:310a-43: gsang sngags phyag rgya sbyor ba'i mthus //
T02TD1682E:310a-44: rigs kyi bdag po yum dang bcas //
T02TD1682E:310a-45: rnam dag mngon shes ye shes rdzogs //
T02TD1682E:310a-46: lag gnyis rol pa'i brtul zhugs kyis //
T02TD1682E:310a-47: gnas gsum rdo rje 'ching sbyor cing //
T02TD1682E:310a-48: rdo rje se gol brdab bya ste //
T02TD1682E:310a-49: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1682E:310a-50: aom stong pa shin tu yod med rnal 'byor mthus //
T02TD1682E:310a-51: nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas //
T02TD1682E:310a-52: bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD1682E:310a-53: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag / dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02TD1682E:310a-54: ae a'a ralli bha ga w'an /
T02TD1682E:310a-55: ma h'a ka ru ni ka dri shya ho: //
T02TD1682E:310a-60: sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1682E:310b-0: gzhan la snang ba'i @310b dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes //
T02TD1682E:310b-1: tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1682E:310b-2: rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad //
T02TD1682E:310b-3: gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mtha' yas //
T02TD1682E:310b-4: snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings la rol //
T02TD1682E:310b-5: kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang //
T02TD1682E:310b-6: rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod rang las byung //
T02TD1682E:310b-7: mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med lhun grub pas //
T02TD1682E:310b-8: tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs gnas //
T02TD1682E:310b-9: sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan phrin las rgyan //
T02TD1682E:310b-10: dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1682E:310b-13: sarba ta th'a ga ta bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD1682E:310b-15: dpal ldan g-yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs //
T02TD1682E:310b-16: g-yas pa ba dan gsum par bya //
T02TD1682E:310b-17: sri zhu byas shing bteg pa'i mchog / bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal //
T02TD1682E:310b-18: 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta //
T02TD1682E:310b-19: bsam pa g-yos pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1682E:310b-20: aom bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1682E:310b-21: rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyis //
T02TD1682E:310b-22: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun //
T02TD1682E:310b-23: kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol //
T02TD1682E:310b-24: aom na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo //
T02TD1682E:310b-26: sarba tadkham aung+ga te spa ra na hi mam gag na kham sv'a h'a /
T02TD1682E:310b-27: tshad med bzhi yi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1682E:310b-28: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dag / dam tshig dkyil 'khor la gzhug cing //
T02TD1682E:310b-29: mnyes nas dges shing brtan par mdzod //
T02TD1682E:310b-30: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog / phyag rgya chen po'i cha lugs ldan //
T02TD1682E:310b-31: khams gsum kun du rgyas btab cing //
T02TD1682E:310b-32: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i bdag / aom badzra satva h'um /
T02TD1682E:310b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag / bdag cag sgrub la rtogs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1682E:310b-35: rigs mchog sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi //
T02TD1682E:310b-36: byin rlabs dbang bskur cho 'phrul bla na med //
T02TD1682E:310b-38: ljags kyi padmo mtshan bcas dkyil //
T02TD1682E:310b-39: 'od zer sbyor ba'i sngags dang bcas //
T02TD1682E:310b-40: aom na ma:sarbba stu ta sarbba buddhe bhya:h'um phat /
T02TD1682E:310b-41: dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya nyid //
T02TD1682E:310b-42: dam tshig gnas su gzhag par bya //
T02TD1682E:310b-43: aom badzra satva sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD1682E:311a-0: srin lag mthe'u chung yan lag @311a * //
T02TD1682E:311a-2: mthe bong legs gzhug dam par bcings //
T02TD1682E:311a-3: rdo rje khu tshur so so yi //
T02TD1682E:311a-4: mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bya //
T02TD1682E:311a-5: aom badzra sa tva karma mu dra h'um /
T02TD1682E:311a-6: aom pa na pe na pe nu su ra ta ti pu pa ra mu sa ma yo ga si ta a'a:h'um /
T02TD1682E:311a-8: rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1682E:311a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzod //
T02TD1682E:311a-10: dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1682E:311a-11: mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod //
T02TD1682E:311a-12: mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol du gsol //
T02TD1682E:311a-14: mar me 'degs sogs so so'i rgya //
T02TD1682E:311a-15: gling bu dang ni pi wang dang //
T02TD1682E:311a-16: rgyud mangs rgyud drug sil snyan dag / dngos 'byor sprul pa gang yang rung //
T02TD1682E:311a-17: rim bzhin sngags dang sbyar te dbul //
T02TD1682E:311a-18: aom 'byung ba lnga las thams cad 'byung //
T02TD1682E:311a-19: rang las ma byung gang yang med //
T02TD1682E:311a-20: gtsang sme'i dri rtog kun bral ba'i //
T02TD1682E:311a-21: bdud rtsi byang chub sems chen pos //
T02TD1682E:311a-22: bdag sogs gnyis su med pa'i phyir //
T02TD1682E:311a-23: mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol //
T02TD1682E:311a-24: aom na ma sarba panytsa aa mri ta a'a:h'um sv'a h'a //
T02TD1682E:311a-25: aom shin tu brgyan pa'i rigs dang mtshan ldan mchog / bkra shis glu dbyangs gar gyis bskyod byas pa'i //
T02TD1682E:311a-26: lha mo rdul snyed phyogs bcur spro byas nas //
T02TD1682E:311a-27: byang sems bde ba'i mchod pas rnam par rol //
T02TD1682E:311a-28: aom ma h'a su kha bo dhi tsitta aa la la ho //
T02TD1682E:311a-29: aom mnyam nyid mi g-yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can //
T02TD1682E:311a-30: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad //
T02TD1682E:311a-31: yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa //
T02TD1682E:311a-32: dri med mi g-yo mnyam med pa yi chos mchog can //
T02TD1682E:311a-33: aom yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de /
T02TD1682E:311a-34: dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin //
T02TD1682E:311a-35: dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams //
T02TD1682E:311a-36: sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol ;
T02TD1682E:311a-37: / aom rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung //
T02TD1682E:311a-38: smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can //
T02TD1682E:311a-39: 'gro ba'i don bsgrub ral tu brtson pa mtha' yas lhur mdzad pa //
T02TD1682E:311a-40: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par gnas //
T02TD1682E:311a-41: aom tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1682E:311b-0: bde bar @311b gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang //
T02TD1682E:311b-1: khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi //
T02TD1682E:311b-2: thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g-yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur //
T02TD1682E:311b-3: aom shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan //
T02TD1682E:311b-4: mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa //
T02TD1682E:311b-5: mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen cing //
T02TD1682E:311b-6: dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol //
T02TD1682E:311b-7: dam tshig la gnas brtul zhugs mchog / gsang sngags thegs pa'i spyod pa nyid //
T02TD1682E:311b-8: rab rdzogs byang chub kun don bzhin //
T02TD1682E:311b-9: 'khor lo bla med rdzogs gyur cig / thugs rje che mnga' thabs ldan pes //
T02TD1682E:311b-10: rigs kyi dngos po brtan par mdzod //
T02TD1682E:311b-11: bya ba'i ye shes mtha' yas mchog / phrin las gnas chen rdzogs gyur cig / rigs kyi sems dpa' gsum ldan pa //
T02TD1682E:311b-12: phyag rgya'i mtshan ma yi ger bcas //
T02TD1682E:311b-14: thabs dang shes rab rnam gnyis rgyun //
T02TD1682E:311b-15: rin chen thig le sna tshogs 'od //
T02TD1682E:311b-16: rigs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02TD1682E:311b-17: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva a'a:dza:h'um bam ho:su ra ta stvam /
T02TD1682E:311b-18: ye shes dkyil 'khor brtan byed pa'i //
T02TD1682E:311b-19: yan lag cho gas kun bsdus te //
T02TD1682E:311b-20: rin chen 'bar ba'i gong bu la //
T02TD1682E:311b-21: mtshan ma rnam gsum rim bzhin rdzogs //
T02TD1682E:311b-22: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor spro bsdu kun //
T02TD1682E:311b-23: mtshan ma rnam pa lnga yi mthar //
T02TD1682E:311b-24: ji srid yul kun brtan gnas pa //
T02TD1682E:311b-25: de nas dmigs pa med pa'i mchog / phyag rgya'i gsang gnas dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1682E:311b-26: yi ge mtshan ma phra mo sku //
T02TD1682E:311b-27: rim bzhin rdzogs par las mdzad cing //
T02TD1682E:311b-28: phyag rgya brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1682E:311b-29: khams gsum yul bcas rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1682E:311b-30: byang chub sems mchog bde ba'i rgyun //
T02TD1682E:311b-31: 'khor lo bzhi gnas rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1682E:311b-32: dga' ba bzhis bskyod nyi zla'i rgya //
T02TD1682E:311b-33: gong gi phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas //
T02TD1682E:311b-34: rab tu chags pa rnam grol sems //
T02TD1682E:311b-35: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1682E:311b-36: gnas gsum bde ba me mar bzhin //
T02TD1682E:311b-37: rnam par spro zhing bsdu bya ste //
T02TD1682E:311b-38: 'dod pa'i yan lag rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1682E:311b-39: thig le mnyam dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1682E:311b-40: dga' bcas byang chub sems gzhi bdag /'byor tshogs yang dag sbyor ba'i mthus //
T02TD1682E:311b-41: skye 'gag chos kun rnam par spangs //
T02TD1682E:312a-2: ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ldan //
T02TD1682E:312a-3: bde ba nyid kyi kun gyi bdag / kun gyi bdag la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1682E:312a-4: chags pa med cing ma chags med //
T02TD1682E:312a-5: dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med //
T02TD1682E:312a-6: bud med kun gyi sgyu sbyor 'di //
T02TD1682E:312a-7: gnyis su med pa'i theg pa mchog / thun mtshams sbyor ba'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1682E:312a-8: rigs kyi dam tshig sngags gsal zhing //
T02TD1682E:312a-9: bzlas brjod la sogs grangs kyis 'jug / ye shes rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo nyid //
T02TD1682E:312a-10: dam tshig yul kun mnyam sbyor zhing //
T02TD1682E:312a-11: rim dang cig car yan lag gis //
T02TD1682E:312a-12: mtshan bcas mtshan ma med gnas dag / rab tu brtan pas gnyis med rdzogs //
T02TD1682E:312a-13: mang du bsags pa'i rdzas rnams kun //
T02TD1682E:312a-14: dag pa'i snod rnams bkang byas te //
T02TD1682E:312a-15: nye bar bsgyur ba'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD1682E:312a-16: gnyis med bdud rtsi chen por bsgrub //
T02TD1682E:312a-17: bsnyen pa rab gsal rdzogs pa las //
T02TD1682E:312a-18: nye bar bsnyen pa'i byin rlabs rgyas //
T02TD1682E:312a-19: bsgrub pa bdag gzhan 'bras bu nyid /
T02TD1682E:312a-20: yang dag brtan 'gyur dga' chen po //
T02TD1682E:312a-21: 'jig rten mgron tshogs ma lus pa //
T02TD1682E:312a-22: rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug / gtor ma'i rdzas rnams bsags pa dang //
T02TD1682E:312a-23: dus gcig thugs kyi mes bsregs shing //
T02TD1682E:312a-24: gsung gi bdud rtsi dag par mdzad //
T02TD1682E:312a-25: sku yi byin rlabs ye shes lnga //
T02TD1682E:312a-26: nye bar bkod pa'i sbyin rnams kyis //
T02TD1682E:312a-27: thams cad dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1682E:312a-28: thabs kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor zhing //
T02TD1682E:312a-29: shes rab yum bcas rol pa nyid //
T02TD1682E:312a-30: de dag sngags dang phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1682E:312a-31: dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs par mchod //
T02TD1682E:312a-32: spyod lam kun du ma nyams blos //
T02TD1682E:312a-33: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor brtan byas te //
T02TD1682E:312a-34: thabs dang shes rab gar sogs kyis //
T02TD1682E:312a-36: nges pa'i gsang mchog phyag rgya'i tshogs //
T02TD1682E:312a-37: nyer gsal bshad pa'i tshul dag gis //
T02TD1682E:312a-38: don kun sku gsung thugs kyi tshul //
T02TD1682E:312a-39: rab sbyangs brtan pas rdzogs pa nyid //
T02TD1682E:312a-40: mi shes dri ma kun sel cing //
T02TD1682E:312a-41: yang dag ye shes gnas gsal byed //
T02TD1682E:312a-42: rigs mchog 'khor lo rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1682E:312a-43: sgrub pa'i thabs 'di rgyas par shog //
T02TD1682E:312a-44: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba //
T02TD1682E:312a-45: slob dpon chen po thu po r'a dza ha ti sa mdzad pa rdzogs so /
